Text.Page:
Velik told me you were coming. I only hope there is still time!
Behind me and far above lies Harrowhold, where the first dragon, Vergos, made its nest in ages past.
Its ancient eggs have finally hatched, and the young dragons have grown mighty on celestial energy.
You must stop them before they take flight and leave their nest. But beware! Each dragon controls a different power, and you must be prepared for each.
May the Goddess be with you...
